body_html:
Hi, girving:
The problematic IndexedSlices comes from "tf.gradients(cost, tvars)". Because if I remove the wrapper "tf.clip_by_global_norm" and leave "grads, _ = tf.gradients(cost, tvars)" alone, the same error shows again.
body_text:
Hi, girving:
The problematic IndexedSlices comes from "tf.gradients(cost, tvars)". Because if I remove the wrapper "tf.clip_by_global_norm" and leave "grads, _ = tf.gradients(cost, tvars)" alone, the same error shows again.
body:
Hi, girving:
The problematic IndexedSlices comes from "tf.gradients(cost, tvars)". Because if I remove the wrapper "tf.clip_by_global_norm" and leave "grads, _ = tf.gradients(cost, tvars)" alone, the same error shows again.
